Annex 1
Basic Financial Management and Supervisory Board
Training of Trainees
Version 8 September 2017 Basic Financial Management and supervisory board Training of trainees for Agriterra staffs under (mission ….) is an assignment within the framework of project 16at-6444. Business advisor responsible for this assignment is Addis Yohannes. In case of changes in the assignment and/or program the Business advisor must be consulted immediately.
Objective In the efforts to improve financial management of unions and cooperative, empower supervisory board committee members role on those unions and cooperatives by using and capacitating internal employees. The ToT includes
1. Basic Financial Management for Cooperatives
Supervisory Board committee
As part of its strategy for 2017 through 2020, Agriterra will continue to support all its clients in terms of transparency and good management practices. These clients include those with which Agriterra is already actively working on this issue and those clients that will join in the future. Hence there will always be demand for these training and have a good pool of local trainers is crucial to achieve sound financial management and good control system in Agriterra. These ToT will deliver for newly identified local trainers of Ethiopia and Indonesia. A ToT will be given to a selected number of participants; Tigist Gezahegn, Mahlet Mekonnen, Ysakor Hailu, Habtamu Awoke, Haile Berhane, Tina from Indonesia.
The ToT will last to Four days, Three Days Basic FMT ToT and One Day Supervisory Board ToT and will Give by Jaime De Alfonso, JDA consult. ToT Programs;
1- October 9,2017 (afternoon, from 12pm) - Meeting with Agriterra Staff
2 – October 10 - 12 2017: ToT with 3 new potential trainers for Basic FM training and Three for SB training (only 10th),
3 – October 13th, 2017: Meeting with Habtamu and Tina to prepare the SB training. Whole day.
4 – October 14th, 2017 (morning): Meeting with Getnet, from Target Consultant, to finalized the preparation of the SFM training (8 - 14h).
5 – October 14th 2017: Closing and debriefing of mission with Agriterra Staff
